pullrequest.title: Add color to edges in model editor schematic view

content.raw:
Just got [this](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/8243) code checker warning on default when this was merged:

~~~
[gazebo/gui/model/qgv/QGVEdge.h:35]: (information) The code 'class QGVCORE_EXPORT QGVEdge :' is not handled. You can use -I or --include to add handling of this code.
[gazebo/gui/model/qgv/QGVScene.h:40]: (information) The code 'class QGVCORE_EXPORT QGVScene :' is not handled. You can use -I or --include to add handling of this code.
~~~
